roleset.name: put one thing atop another
roleset.note: SUPERIMPOSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'superimpose' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from superimpose.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: always passive?
example.text: Breaking into the raucous Chicago Bears-Cleveland Browns match during last week's Monday night football game, it was nothing but [simple block letters]-1 superimposed *trace*-1 on the TV screen.
